name: Solitaire Lottery
description:
The classic card game ”Solitaire” can be easily enjoyed.
Anyone can play with ease thanks to easy and simple operation.

- Easy to use, so you can play even with one hand.
- You can customize the background and BGM and card to your liking.
- Hints help you find out which cards you can move.
- You can undo a card that has been moved by mistake with using Undo.


EU / California users can opt-out under GDPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
